welcome_message_body: "Welcome to South Bend, where the charm of our historic city meets the excitement of college football at Notre Dame. We invite you to explore our vibrant downtown, scenic riverfront, and famous landmarks. Enjoy your time in our beautiful city!"

restaurants.name: Fiddler's Hearth
restaurants.description: Fiddler's Hearth is a irish pub located in South Bend.
restaurants.address: 127 N Main St, South Bend, IN 46601

restaurants.name: Cafe Navarre
restaurants.description: Cafe Navarre is a american restaurant located in South Bend.
restaurants.address: 101 N Michigan St (Washington), South Bend, IN 46601

restaurants.description: Chicory Cafe is a cajun and creole restaurant located in South Bend.
restaurants.address: 105 E Jefferson Blvd, South Bend, IN 46601

restaurants.name: LaSalle Kitchen & Tavern
restaurants.description: LaSalle Kitchen & Tavern is a gastropub located in South Bend.

restaurants.name: South Bend Chocolate Cafe
restaurants.description: South Bend Chocolate Cafe is a café located in South Bend.
restaurants.address: 122 S Michigan St (at Washington St), South Bend, IN 46601

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at South Bend Regional Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
